notebook: I need to find some kind of proof to show the lady's vulnerability to fake news.
Lateral reading: is the act of evaluating the credibility of a source by comparing it with other sources.
Cross-referencing involves comparing information from the original source with information from other sources.
Source evaluation: Look to see if someone else has already fact-checked the claim. Go to the original source to understand the trustworthiness of the information.
Time Lines: Truth is always changing. Consider the publication date and whether the information is up-to-date and relevant now.
Dr. Green is using these two potions - Infinity, Blue color, A25, used in beauty products; Lifespring, Pink color, A21, for aiding sleep.
Dr. Green is staying here with his daughter for sabbatical. His daughter's birthday is on 09/05. It seems there is something wrong with his daughter though...
I think I know what happened. Alina may have the insomnia disease, and Dr. Green developed the cure, which is a combination of Lifespring and Infinity.
Ms. White wants me to interview those villagers and find out why they believe Dr. Green has the immortality portion.

clueList.clueInfo: There is a bag of mushroom. The label on the bag says it's from 'Mr. Mustard's business'.
clueList.clueDetail: The mushrooms reminds me of something but I can't remember..

clueList.clueInfo: Why would I trust it so easily?
clueList.clueDetail:
A: You have a tendency of believing in emotional appeal information.
B: You need to be careful of confirmation bias.
C: You have political or ideological motivations

clueList.clueInfo: This is the way going out.
clueList.clueDetail: I need to get the information first for Ms. White.

clueList.clueInfo: You got the note of the testimony.
There is a bunch of newspaper clippings. The lady might read them and really find them useful.
clueList.clueDetail: 《Heartfelt Triumph: Overcoming Adversity in the Battle Against Cancer》《Tears of Joy: Miracle Recovery After a Life-Threatening Illness》《Passionate Pleas: Celebrities Speak Out on the Crisis You Can't Ignore》.

clueList.clueInfo: There is some newspaper. They look like new.
clueList.clueDetail: 《Public Health Update: Vaccination Campaign Targets Flu Season》《Government Initiatives to Improve Mental Health Services》《Physical Activity Guidelines Updated for Optimal Health》.
I poured myself a glass of water and drank it.

key.Right: The lady looks at you and nodded. Maybe... she says. You got the lady's testimony.
key.Wrong: The lady doesn't seem to be convinced. Maybe I'll need to show her some evidence.

hint: The lady wants me to help her avoid misinformation next time. Maybe it would help if I can tell her why she would trust those information so easily.
